Search your affiliates below by name, contact, prospect # or email. Click the affiliate name to edit. Click the "Add New Affiliate" link above to add a new affiliate.
Contact Name / Address
Email / Status

CONTACT INFORMATION: If this is an individual, Enter the first name, last name, email and the Social Security Number. If this is for a Company, Enter the Company contact's first name, last name and email, Company name and the Company's Federal Tax ID Number.

LOGON / PASSWORD: Enter a unique Logon name and Password to be used to access your secured Affiliate Back Office. If a Logon Name and Password are not entered the system will generate a random Logon and Password and email them to you.
Specify up to 10 Lead Pages numbers for this Affiliate to access. Separate each number with a comma or a space. Leave blank for all affiliate lead pages.
CREATE FROM PROSPECT: To create a new affiliate from an existing prospect, enter the prospect # to be copied and click the "Copy" button.
Select "Authorized User" and "Active" from the list boxes below to enable this affiliate to access the Affiliate Back Office. Leave blank to disallow access.

Click the name of the Lead Page to view the usage instructions and traffic statistics. Click the [Preview] link to view the lead program as it will appear to the user.
